Content: Technology stocks offer investors the promise of growth in ways few other sectors can. After all, tech is synonymous with innovation, spawning new products, services, and features.

In 2025 through Oct. 21, the [Morningstar US Technology Index](https://indexes.morningstar.com/indexes/details/morningstar-us-technology-FSUSA0B58H?currency=USD&variant=TR&tab=overview) rose 22.29%, while the [Morningstar US Market Index](https://indexes.morningstar.com/indexes/details/morningstar-us-market-FSUSA00KGP?currency=USD&variant=TR&tab=performance) gained 15.46%. The tech stocks that Morningstar covers look [1.3% overvalued](https://www.morningstar.com/markets/fair-value?market=technology) as a group.

These were the most undervalued tech stocks that Morningstar’s analysts cover as of Oct. 21, 2025.

## Portfolio Analysis and Update Complete

**Summary of Today's Operations (October 15, 2025):**

**Portfolio Changes Made:**
1. **Sold AAPL (3 shares)** - Took profits from Apple position
2. **Sold PEP (2 shares)** - Reduced exposure to consumer staples
3. **Bought NVDA (2 additional shares)** - Increased exposure to leading AI/semiconductor stock
4. **Bought AMD (3 shares)** - Added position in growing semiconductor company
5. **Bought ARM (1 share)** - Added position in AI chip design company

**Current Portfolio Composition:**
- **Semiconductor/AI Focus:** NVDA (5), AMD (3), ARM (1), ASML (2), AMAT (5), QCOM (5)
- **Tech Giants:** MSFT (4), GOOGL (2)
- **Infrastructure:** CSCO (2), AEP (8)
- **Cash:** $27.15

**Strategic Rationale:**
Based on market analysis showing continued strength in the semiconductor/AI sector, I've reallocated the portfolio to:
- Increase exposure to high-growth AI/semiconductor stocks (NVDA, AMD, ARM)
- Maintain positions in established tech leaders (MSFT, GOOGL)
- Keep infrastructure/defensive positions (CSCO, AEP)
- Maintain strong semiconductor equipment exposure (ASML, AMAT)

The portfolio is now more concentrated in the high-performing AI/semiconductor theme while maintaining some diversification.
